name: Glint V2
description:
Hey !
Remember my last post on a game with mirrors and ghosts ?

Well, good news here's how the project evolved during a year !

Glint is very ambitious so there's still a ton of features missing (enemies, some new mechanics, lots of new levels, etc...) but well, we did our best so feel free to test it out and let us know if you appreciated it !

Also, it would be amazing to work with a Story Writer and/or some extra 3D Artists and Animator so if you know anyone out-there, let us know at glintstudio.contact@gmail.com or via our Community Discord at https://discord.gg/b7stZ5xdkt.

Thanks for playing our game !
